episodes.title: 'Doomsday Mom' Lori Vallow Daybell represents herself in new murder trial
episodes.description:
Lori Vallow Daybell, the Idaho woman infamously known as "The Doomsday Mom," was back in court Monday after she was sentenced to life in prison in 2023 for the murders of her two youngest children, 7-year-old J.J. Vallow and 16-year-old Tylee Ryan.

Aside from murder, Vallow Dayball was found guilty of plotting to kill her husband’s late wife, Tammy Daybell, as well as a charge of grand theft. 

#lorivallowtrial #lorivallowdaybell #daybell #daybelltrial
